text:
Hi All,

On this page here I am trying to shift the text that appears when you hover over "tablets" As you can see breakfast is being hidden.Any idea how to do this?
<https://news.weareblooming.com/careers#vacatures>
are global modules automatically locked for editors?

Yes, and if you need to edit content then you need to navigate through design manager.

and if you want to change source code of prebuilt modules, you need to first clone that module.
